post.Title: Java desktop links of the week, March 5
post.Content:
Some good links this week - enjoy! :-)

  • Michael Hoffer has a youtube video up about creating native JDK 9 application bundles with small runtimes.
  • Hallvard Traetteberg has a forum post about integrating Scene Builder into Eclipse.
  • Samir Hadzic has two posts this week. Firstly, a tip for getting the user download folder path. Secondly, he has a post on 'when the listener is listening too much'.
  • The conservation coding blog has a post titled '2018: Tech and Coding for Marine Mammal Science', where they cover building a colour slider in JavaFX.
  • Josh Wickham has a post titled 'creating an Integer Spinner in JavaFX'.
